summary: Darker edit of the vanilla version
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] This is another clothing set I quite liked the design of but found the vanilla textures way too bright. I darkened most of the variants quite severely, apart from the brightest. I kinda liked how it looked for some reason so tried to keep it brighter.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] Since this is only a texture replacing mod you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]1st Person Female Fix :[/b][/color] There is a bug in skyrim where alternate texture sets don't show up in the first person view for female characters, but I came across a solution while splitting out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/?]Darker Dark Brotherhood [/url]mod into separate textures for worn and ancient armors. This vampire set was the first to spring to my mind as needing a fix since it has always bugged me :).... [color=#f9cb9c]Update :[/color] I changed my mind about doing these fixes on a mod per mod basis after I realised I would be pretty much covering every texture set that needs fixed anyways hehe, so this is now part of my new [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75062/?]First Person Female Alternate Textures Fix[/url] mod :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and are free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :). If anyone feels like editing my textures to their tastes (or mixing in the vanilla texture if you think I have gone OTT hehe) then these are also a lot nicer starting point.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Optional hellhound texture :[/b][/color] I didn't feel this was worth a separate mod release , is a simple edit to make the vampire dogs look a bit more scary :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I always use the lossless versions of my textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url]


[center][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b]
